_header: Honoured be this holy feast day
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Angels’ Song on Epiphany, in the English translation of the Pèlerinage de l’âme — four stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
Worschepid be þis holy fest day In honour of þe suet well
                    of lyf…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…In honour of this gret solempnyte Worschippid be the holy
                    trynyte
Bod770.Attributed Title: Song of þe assumpcion day of our lady (f. 94)

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
Worschipyd be þis holy fest dayIn honowre of þe swette
                    well of lyfe…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…In honowre of þis highe solempnyteworschippid be þe
                    holy trenyte

CamGon124.First Lines:
honowred be þis holy feste dayIn worschip of þe swete
                    welle of lyf…
CamGon124.Last Lines:
…In honour of þis hye solempnytehonowred be þe holy
                    trynyte
CamGon124.Attributed Title: the aungeles song in þe feste of þe Epyphanie (p. 238)

CULKk17.First Lines:
Honourid be þis holy feste dayIn worchep of þe swote
                    welle of lyff…
CULKk17.Last Lines:
…In honour of þis hye solempnyteHonourid be þe holy
                    trinyte
CULKk17.Attributed Title:
her endith þe drem of þe pilgrimage of þe soule (f.
                        124v)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Worschepede be þis holy feste dayIn honoure of þe swete
                    welle of life…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…In honoure of þis hy solempnteworschepede be þe
                    trinite

BLEge615.First Lines: HOnured be this blissed holy feste dayIn worshippe of the sweet welle of lisse…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …In honure of this solenniteHonured be the blissed Trinite
